license.comment: A few of them are on Apache 2.0 license.

SDG[0].comment: No evidence of poverty reduction related tools. OpenG2P tools are mostly focusing on civil registries and digital identities and digital payments.

SDG[1].comment: Tools for Payments and Identity Management could help to target hunger eradication program to an extent.

SDG[2].comment: Tools for Digital Identity Management could help to deliver good health and well being services.

SDG[3].comment: Tools for Digital Identity Management could help to deliver targeted quality education services.

SDG[4].comment: Tools for Digital Identity Management could help to deliver targeted gender equality services.

SDG[5].comment: Tools for Digital Identity Management could help to deliver targeted clean water and sanitation services.

SDG[6].comment: Tools for Digital Identity Management could help to deliver targeted clean energy  services.

SDG[7].comment: Tools for Digital Identity Management and Digital Payment could help to deliver targeted clean water and sanitation services.

SDG[8].comment: Tools for Digital Identity Management could help to deliver targeted clean water and sanitation services to an extent.

SDG[9].comment: Tools for ERP could help to connect and collaborate on partnerships.
